name: MURDERSHIFTERS
description:
In the crowd, amongst the throng of citizens lie a killer who looks like any other... Your job is to track him down, and eliminate him.

MURDERSHIFTERS takes place in a world where MURDERSHIFTERS roam the streets. These vile creatures kill their victims and then utilize their energies to shapeshift into them.




Every MURDERSHIFTER is affected differently by MURDERSHIFTING. It can range from becoming slow and fat to becoming red with power. Use these side-effects to differentiate MURDERSHIFTERS from the crowd, and take them out with as few innocents caught in the crossfire as possible!




It's Where's Waldo meets Hitman! Play now!




P.S. If you have trouble in windowed mode on the Windows executable, try fullscreen mode, and vice versa.

P.P.S. The Unity3D Web Player version above is the post-LD version, with minor bugfixes but no changes to gameplay. There is also a post-LD version available for download. I highly recommend that one over the normal one as it fixes a few annoying (but not gamebreaking) bugs. The source code is not post-LD; It still contains the bugs.
